Name: Hyperspace Invaders II: Pixel Edition
About the game: Hyperspace Invaders II: Pixel Edition is a hardcore, uncompromising vertical scrolling bullet hell/invader hell shooter (shmup) that doubles as a techno-based lightsynth, triggering bursts of funky invaders at the pulse of a relentless beat. HIII:PE also features an extra track/level by French flashcore artist HFK , pushing the engine to a gameplay tempo of 360BPM. - Hardcore, uncompromising vertical scrolling bullet hell/invader hell action . - Tempo-synced Gameplay (invader movement, bulletpatterns and more get triggered at the pulse of a beat) - Adaptive Difficulty (harder as you play better) - Generative Gameplay (never the same level twice) - Dominate the Steam Leaderboards and unlock all the Achievements ! - Full Controller Support (+ Vibration) - An OST of 10 tracks by renowned artists in the world of electronic music, such as: Carl Finlow / Ronny Ragtroll / Karl Lihagen / Atomhead / Subjex / Zuvuya / Mergel / NoProblemCore / Psykovsky & Arcek / HFK and WK(ES) .
